twoSetSkill.name: Observation 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: When attacking slowed enemies, the host gains a 15% Attack Speed buff for 4s. Triggering this again resets the duration.

threeSetSkill.name: Absolute Zero 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Gain 30% Ice DMG. Combo/charged attacks further gain 10% Total DMG Multiplier.
